body:
Comment 1 by **f.guerrieri**: 
I confirm this bug: 
on Snow Leopard (32bit) sometimes it runs, sometimes it crash, and sometimes it 
hangs, without crashing.
When it hangs, it is not really dead, as you can see with top:

PID  COMMAND      %CPU TIME     #TH  #WQ  #POR #MREG RPRVT  RSHRD  RSIZE  VPRVT 
VSIZE  PGRP PPID STATE    UID  FAULTS

351- 8.out        49.0 00:19.49 2    0    35   17    412K   240K   1104K  9716K  66M
   351  204  sleeping 501  352
